#Synopsis.text:
Meme Oshino decides to help Hitagi Senjougahara to fight her oddity but before that, she needs to take a bath in cold water and change into clean clothes. At the beginning of the ceremony, Hitagi reveals his past and the history of her expensive surgery and her parents.
The crab Oddity called Heavy Stone Crab appears and throws back Hitagi. Koyomi places his body between her and the wall to rescue her.
